text: aur yadi unakee vimukhata tumhaare lie asahaneey hai, to yadi tumase ho sake ki dharatee mein koee surang ya aakaash mein koee seedhee dhoondh nikaalo aur unake paas koee nishaanee le aao, to (aisa kar dekho), yadi allaah chaahata to un sabako seedhe maarg par ikattha kar deta. atah tum ujadd aur naadaan na banana
